::Slayer::

Slayer detects two bots following him. He sighs. So much for an easy 
escape. He speeds up, not heading toward the Trainer base but toward 
another location that somehow had revelance in his mind. Unknowingly 
to him, he was speeding toward the old location of the Ark, before it 
had been repaired by Liono and launched off toward space.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Attilla/Luzbel/3 bat probes::
> 
> Atilla and Luzbel left the water and changing to robot mode, they 
> turning on their jetpack, they followed Slayer
